14322.content:
Ah, I see. You wish for DJ to eat you up personally! Wonderful choice! Without further ado, here's the story.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------------------------

You were walking down the street, nothing new. You had just finished your job for the day, so you had nothing to worry about being late for. As you were walking down the street, you had noticed a small group of people standing around something that you can't make out. Getting closer, you can see...DJ from Total Drama Island, completely naked on the street, with a sign that said something along the lines of "I'm choosing one person to take home and be with! Come and see if you're my lucky choice!". Intrigued, you head over to the front of the circle, to get the clearest view of DJ. He was rather tall, compared to most of the people in the crowd, he was maybe 2 feet taller than everyone. Although, you were a bit special compared to the other people in the crowd. While DJ was about 2 feet taller than most of the people in the crowd, and they got up to about his chest, you had a special condition that rendered you quite smaller than most, and you only came up to his ankles! Of course, DJ noticed this rather quickly, and walked over to you, creating thumps on the ground as he walks that make you stumble a bit. Eventually, he was entirely above you, his feet between you, giving you a wonderful view of his dick. DJ then looks down and carefully picks you up, and, holding you to his chest, declares to the crowd: "I have made my choice! I choose...this man right here!" He declares this as he calmly pats your head with the palm of his other hand.

After he declares this, the crowd begins to leave and go back to their everyday life, and once everyone's gone, DJ looks down at you. "Hey there, little guy, looks like you and I will be together!" You began to smile with pure joy and glee. DJ notices this, and then says to you, "Come on, lil guy, let's go back to my home." As he walks home, you're in so much joy that you get to be with DJ, or to you, a giant DJ! As you sit on his hand in pure joy, shaking a bit as he walks, you accidentally slip and fall. After falling for what feels like forever, you eventually land on,,,,
14322.title: Bumping Into DJ

choices: Playful and Caring (No Death and/or Reformation)
143222.content:

He chuckles lightly, before saying, "Hey there, you little rascal, you. How's about you rest there until we get to my house? It's not that far now, in fact, it's actually a few houses down." You nod, and DJ continues walking, and soon reaches his house, where he then goes in and shuts the door, heads up to his room, and then sits at his desk, placing you on the desktop. I didn't get to ask you earlier." You blush a bit, and reply with, "I-I'm Y/N (Your Name). It's a pleasure to meet you, DJ." You hold a small hand for him to shake, and he shakes it politely with his pinky, which is about the size of you.

When the handshake stops, DJ pats your head once more and says to you, "Alright, so, let's get this out of the way...I don't think I've ever had someone as small as you to be with me, so...this means we have a lot more opportunities at hand. We can do lots more things that most others that I've chosen can't." Hearing this, you smile widely and then DJ stands up, laying his dick down on the desk in front of you, which looks like a building to you. DJ smiles after he does this and asks, "So, what I usually do is have a choice for the people I choose. Of course, I'm the dom here, no doubt, but, I like to have the people I choose make a choice, on whether or not they want me to be playful and caring, or rough and cruel. Right now, this choice is up to you. Go on, choose Y/N." You think hard, and eventually, you tell your answer. You choose...

144.title: Duncan

14411.content:
Duncan woke up on Wawanakwa stark naked and with no idea what was going on. Around him he could see the other male competitors, also naked and confused, but no girls.

Pulling himself off of the ground he felt a sharp pain in his stomach. He was so hungry. Trying to surpress his growling belly he walked over to the other contestants who appeared to be arguing.

"I told you it wasn't me!"
"You're the nerd Harold, you probably concocted this!"
"Geoff does insane things all the time, he was probably trying to set up some weird orgy!"
"How about Duncan, huh? He's the criminal here!"

As suddenly as it began the arguing stopped and all eyes were on Duncan. Trent smirked, his suggestion seemed to go down well with the others. Duncan on the other hand was livid.

"Just because I'm a criminal doesn't mean I did this!" Glaring at Trent he silenced the indie boy. However Harold wouldn't back down as easily. "Oh come on! Who knows what he was arrested for! For all we know he drugs and kidnaps people all the time..."

Harold would have continued if not for Duncan punching him in the face. Hell broke loose again and all the boys went seperate ways to figure out what had happened.

Belly growling Duncan remembered he was still hungry. And vengeful. Grinning to himself he whispered, "If it's a criminal they want then it's a criminal they'll get!" He then concocted a plan to get back at Trent and Harold as well as soothe his empty tummy:
14411.title: Island

144112.content:
As much as he hated Harold Trent looked to be more filling than the scrawny teen. The delinquent stealthily made his way after the guitarist as he stormed off towards the dock. As Trent swung his legs over the edge of the boardwalk Duncan crept up behind him and opened his mouth as wide as he could.

The aspiring musician frowned in confusion as he saw an inky shadow reflected in the water but as he began to turn his head to check out who was disturbing him he found himself obscured in darkness. Duncan's maw had completely consumed Trent's head and neck and he began to hastily devour the other boy. One gulp and Trent's chest was in his mouth. Another gulp and his hips were being eaten. Gulping again Duncan swallowed Trent down to his knees. One final gulp and Trent's feet were being inhaled. Duncan moaned in delight as the teen slid down his throat and entered his stomach, falling back onto his butt as his belly expanded to contain him.

The delinquent's eyes fluttered closed as his tummy flopped heavily onto his lap, feelings of contentment, joy, and, to his surprise, arousal, starting to bubble up inside him. Eventually gaining his bearings Duncan opened his eyes and slowly looked down to see his belly, now the size of a large yoga ball, sloshing about in front of him as Trent squirmed inside. He cautiously reached out a hand and touched his new blubber gently, inwardly melting as the soft flesh rippled at his touch. 'This is... actually kinda nice...'

His musings were halted however as he heard something coming up behind him. Rocking his fat body to build momentum, he hoisted himself up, his belly jiggling as he whipped round to find:
